headline.main: ' RICH WIDOW' CALLED AIDE IN NAZI SPY RING; Unidentified, She Is Said to Have Offered Financial Help

lead_paragraph: An unidentified "wealthy widow" with homes in both the United States and Cuba stood ready to finance German espionage activities in this country as recently as last May, according to testimony yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial.
abstract: FBI agent testifies on F J Stigler-Sebold conf on funds offered spy ring by wealthy lady
snippet: An unidentified "wealthy widow" with homes in both the United States and Cuba stood ready to finance German espionage activities in this country as recently as last May, according to testimony yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial....
